content: well as save your downloaded pdf patterns to dropbox and access them that way row 1 example row 1 of this example pattern is the blue row of single_crochet in back loops only notice that even though the shading of the pattern changes to show what the final product will look like…row 1 is entirely empty boxes all the way across that means single_crochet into every stitch each row alternates colors color a is the color of the design ©2022 heather noble designs instructions 5 row 2 example join with your new color in the last stitch of each round in row 2 color b the x means double_crochet into the front loop of the corresponding stitch 2 row below and the means single_crochet into back loop of the current row work the row from right to left double_crochet 5 single_crochet 4 double_crochet 4 single_crochet 4 double_crochet 3 row 3 final product ©2022 heather noble designs stitch key 1 updated 5 31 22 i have created many of the stitches and notation system in my designs there is not a current standard notation system for mosaic overlay crochet so please take some time to familiarize yourself with mine i have used the craft yarn council standards abbreviations here is a link to that list https //www craftyarncouncil com/standards *please note-several symbols are color-coded do not print your charts in grey-scale 1 scblo chart symbol written abbreviation definition single_crochet single_crochet into back loop of current row video tutorial single_crochet 2 dcflo chart symbol written abbreviation definition x double_crochet double_crochet into front loop of corresponding stitch 2 row below double_crochet - original tutorial update double_crochet © 2022 heather noble designs stitch key 2 updated 5 31 22 3 border stitch this is the new version i ve also included the video link for the original version if you prefer that method chart symbol written abbreviation definition bs bs use a border stitch to startand end each row beginning in row 2 *row 1 is the foundation row beginning bs make a standing single_crochet between the legs of the first stitch ending bs make a single_crochet between the legs of the last stitch chain 1 cut yarn border stitch - original version updated border stitch tutorial © 2022 heather noble designs stitch key 3 updated 5 31 22 4 angled double_crochet 1l can be made in color a or color b chart symbol written abbreviation definition work an angled double_crochet angled double_crochet 1l / 1 to the left / angled double_crochet 1l - original tutorial update angled double_crochet 1l *example 1 angled double_crochet 1l in multiples chart symbol written abbreviation definition / / angled double_crochet 1l 2 times work 2 angled double_crochet 1l in a row 2 1 *example 2 combined with double_crochet chart symbol written abbreviation definition skip 1 double_crochet 2 in the next st x / skip 1 work 2 double_crochet stitches into the next loop both stitches into the same loop © 2022 heather noble designs stitch key 4 updated
